channel.title: CVE Feed for Universal Robots -- Universal Robots Robot Controllers Version CB 3.1, SW Version 3.4.5-100
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Universal Robots -- Universal Robots Robot Controllers Version CB 3.1, SW Version 3.4.5-100

item.title: CVE-2018-10635|2024-09-17T03:18:19.429Z -- universal%20robots -- universal%20robots%20robot%20controllers%20version%20cb%203.1%2C%20sw%20version%203.4.5-100
item.description: In Universal Robots Robot Controllers Version CB 3.1, SW Version 3.4.5-100, ports 30001/TCP to 30003/TCP listen for arbitrary URScript code and execute the code. This enables a remote attacker who has access to the ports to remotely execute code that may allow root access to be obtained.
